website_summaries.verdict: Recently dubbed as “Mom’s favorite shoe”, the Nike Tanjun is currently considered as the go-to sneaker of loving mothers on the lookout for reasonably-priced everyday footwear. An upgraded version called the Nike Tanjun Premium was recently released.Crafted with top-grade materials, this shoe, although sold at a slightly higher rate is still undeniably inexpensive. Moms and the general public continue to perceive this shoe as an appealing option for its visually-attractive silhouette, comfort, versatility, not to mention, affordability.
pros: Same with other Nike Tanjun iterations, this shoe is commonly described as extremely comfortable
Teens and adults who have bought the Tanjun Premium praised the shoe for its simple and clean yet stylish looks
A good deal of users were pleased with the lightweight and durable construction of the Nike Tanjun Premium
Although affordable, the shoe was perceived as high-quality, noted by several consumers
When worn for work or long walks, as well as running, cardio training and other types of activities, the shoe held up, confirmed by the majority of the purchasers
Many liked that this sneaker was easy to slip on
Breathable and light, this sneaker was considered as a perfect summer shoe by more than a handful of users
This product is available in a wide array of colors that can be easily matched with various types of clothing
Some noticed that the shoe looked better in person than online
cons: The Nike Tanjun Premium runs narrow, according to a couple of users
There were a few who thought the shoe fits smaller than their usual choice
The shoe’s color looked different in person, not many observed

customer_reviews.title: Not cushioned. Very hard outsole.
customer_reviews.text: I've done and am still doing research on shoes. I have plantar fasciitis and need a cushioned shoe. This is definitely not it. I'm not sure what's going on with the reviews and/or the claims by the company, but these shoes have a cheap 2mm foam insert on top of an extremely hard outsole. This thing does not give at all. I tried these shoes on for 15 minutes and couldn't stand the pain. These may be great for stability, I don't know. They're definitely not comfortable or cushioned at all.
customer_reviews.author: BlackJack

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Sneakers!
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased many pairs of sneakers over the years, but the Nike Tanjun Running Sneaker literally has been the only pair I've owned that has checked all the boxes. They are light weight, super comfortable, stylish, durable, and fit perfectly. I have worn them almost daily for months now and they still look as good as the day I bought them. I highly recommend these sneakers!
customer_reviews.author: Schulo

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and lightweight
customer_reviews.text: I work 80 hours a week. I am going to put these shoes to the test. This is my second pair and I must say these shoes can take a beating. I have foot problems but these shoes help with the pain. I stay on my feet all day and I recommend them Comfortable and lightweight.
customer_reviews.author: Amazonman

customer_reviews.title: Great sneakers so far
customer_reviews.text: Extremely lightweight and breathable sneakers. Very comfortable. They do need to be broken in by wear but that doesn't take long at all. Size ran normal for me also. Great sneakers.
customer_reviews.author: Bekim

customer_reviews.title: Terrible quality, knock off shoe
customer_reviews.text: Ordered a Nike, got a ??? Cheap foam insert does not even go to the end of the shoe. The Nike symbol is not there at all. Poorly made in China. Thank goodness we used amazon prime and will be returning it today.
customer_reviews.author: Johnsons

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoes.
customer_reviews.text: Really comfortable. Lightweight too. Really nothing wrong with them from what i can tell
customer_reviews.author: Dylan Johnson

customer_reviews.title: I’m flat footed, and these are the softest, most comfortable sneakers I’ve ever owned!
customer_reviews.text: I have flat feet, and finding a comfortable walking/running shoe is extremely difficult. My job requires a LOT of walking several hours a day, and these feel like I’m wearing socks! Incredibly soft and comfortable, and I can walk all day in my flat feet. I was so impressed with these that after just 3 days I ordered another pair in a different color. If you have flat feet like me, you will absolutely LOVE these!
customer_reviews.author: D. Cushman

customer_reviews.title: A Year Later
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been wearing these shoes very regularly for about 14 months. Here’s the short: Pros: These are pretty comfortable and good if you’re on your feet all day and want shoes that can assist in delaying heel pain. Cons: The tread is GONE. I’ve found myself slipping and sliding for a few months to the point that it’s time to retire these permanently. I’d keep wearing if the tread lasted longer, but it just hasn’t help up even to relatively light use after one year. Conclusion: Worth it, but look for a sale, because they probably won’t last as long as you’d like.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonUser

customer_reviews.title: I received a shoe of different color(white and black) Bad quality too
customer_reviews.text: The shoe was white and black and quality doesn't seem good, no point in returning it as there is no guarantee I will get a different one.
customer_reviews.author: HS

customer_reviews.title: Not bad looking shoe, but narrow
customer_reviews.text: These were kind of narrow and hurt my feet until like the 6th time I wore them... Then again I have wide feet, so that could be part of the issue. Also the toe started separating from the front of the shoe like the 4th time I wore them,, so I was not happy about that.. Bought nikes before in the past, and never had the issue. Love the all black tho!!
customer_reviews.author: Ocherish1

customer_reviews.title: Fits the bill
customer_reviews.text: I actually had to return these. They were a present for my dad but ran just a little too small. Amazon didn't have the correct size so I ended up ordering them from famous footwear. That said, I got these for my dad because my bf has the same ones and LOVES them. My dads replacement shoes came in the mail and he loves these as well. They're light and comfortable and look decent. I would 100% recommend them, but possibly order the half size up.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: A Near Perfect Shoe.
customer_reviews.text: I love these for running and day to day wear. So comfy, I love the sleek minimalist style, no gawdy colors or design, and they breathe! I plan on buying more (colors) of these as long as Nike makes them. $70 feels a little steep for how light these are, but hey... It's Nike. Only downside is that the material is tough to clean, so maybe avoid white.
customer_reviews.author: eMon

customer_reviews.title: Worst shoes ever bought.
customer_reviews.text: I have NO idea how it got so many 5 stars. Probably from sponsors, paid people or amateur sneakerheads. The quality is of a sweat factory that costs $1.50 for sale to make. It's an absolute rip off and the gums are too high. Go to the mall and buy a better quality pair. Not even the outlets have it this bad. Clearance product.
customer_reviews.author: Common Sense Reviews

customer_reviews.title: These are nice shoes! I will say from past experience
customer_reviews.text: These are nice shoes! I will say from past experience, that Nike shoe sizes do run small. I normally wear a 10 1/2, but with Nike I wear an 11 1/2. I bought 11 1/2 and they fit perfectly and they are very comfortable. Hard to find basic black and white shoes anymore. Everything is either neon orange or some other crazy color. I do recommend these shoes though. Just be carefull about the size you order.
customer_reviews.author: Jim F

customer_reviews.title: Somewhat small
customer_reviews.text: Last year I ordered these exact same sneakers. The fit and comfort was perfect. I loved them and, therefore, I ordered another pair this summer. I was disappointed with the new pair. The new pair is smaller and tighter although it is the exact same size, 9.5, as the older ones. What I noticed on the label is that last year's pair was made in Indonesia. This year's pair is made in Vietnam. Nike's specs shrunk in the process. If in doubt, order larger.
customer_reviews.author: Fussy Guy Garrett

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy this garbage! It last 3 months
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy this garbage! It last 3 months. Then the front top starts to rip up! Very not lasting material. DON’T waste your money
customer_reviews.author: Ciro Parlato

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe for standing 24+ hours
customer_reviews.text: I have ankle pain from standing for 24+ hours in the ICU rounding (also have excessive eversion of my feet and some peroneal tendonitis from a tennis injury). I had tried compression socks and wearing an AFO brace to help. These helped some but since switching to these shoes 2 months ago...my pain is practically gone. I probably just needed to replace my older new balances (worn for 12 months) but still....very happy with this shoe thus far. Light weight, breathable, and not too expensive. Im in the NICU so unlikely to get major spills so I didn't really care about water resistance.
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: New favorite shoe. 5 stars!
customer_reviews.text: After MANY years of wearing 3 kinds of shoes (Nike Cortez, Reebok Classics, and Chuck Taylor's), pretty much exclusively, i decided to try out something new......and dammit! Im sure glad that i did!!! These shoes are *extremely* comfortable, and weigh next to nothing! They feel great on my feet, and i couldn't be happier with my purchase. Theyre also very breathable, and look great with pretty much anything. I think i have found my newest "permanant" shoe. I will definitely be buying these again next time, and most likely for the forseeable future.
customer_reviews.author: ParasiticSociety1423

customer_reviews.title: Very Comfortable, Good Product, liked it so much I ordered a second pair
customer_reviews.text: I wear it for my personal training workouts. I then started jumping rope wearing them, then started pushing the damn sled. If felt good and held up fine. It doesn't look like a sneaker. More like half shoe half sneaker. I ordered a second pair and started wearing them into the office now and then. No one really noticed or at least said anything. Very versatile product that looks good and is easy to wear.
customer_reviews.author: Georgie

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Shoes!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my boyfriend. He is on his feet all day, working in a warehouse. Didn't want another pair of work boots so we decided on these. He absolutely LOVES them. His end of the day aches (back, hips, knees) & fatigue are gone and he cant stop telling me what great shoes these are and have made all the difference in his daily routine. That makes me happy!
customer_reviews.author: Angie

customer_reviews.title: Beware that they are not used ...
customer_reviews.text: The shoes are fine but the fact that they were already worn was upsetting. See photos. The bottoms are obviously worn and dirty. Not sure how they passed any product inspections at Amazon. Box was very damaged as well.
customer_reviews.author: martisse

customer_reviews.title: !! CONSUMER ALERT !!
customer_reviews.text: !! CONSUMER ALERT !! After further use & really feeling the shoes out. It felt like the shoes has two different density rubbers for its soles and sown on crooked on the left shoe. I've purchases this shoes at least 5 times in the past. This pair does not feel rite. I believe consumers affairs really needs to step in & assure the people are not being victimized my malicious predators disguised as vendors. I'm not sure if the product only or both the product & vendor should be avoided. Disappointed consumer.
customer_reviews.author: Paul P.

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and super light!
customer_reviews.text: Honestly, with as light as these things are, I figured they wouldn’t last a week. Been wearing these things for awhile and they handle abuse. When these go, I’m probably going to buy another pair. My other shoes killed my knee to stand all day, these, I’m still mobile and ready to go after ten hours on my feet.
customer_reviews.author: D. Hunter

customer_reviews.title: Damn good shoe
customer_reviews.text: IMO this is Nike's best running shoe, if not their best shoe they made ever. It's comfortable, lightweight, and smooth which is what I look for in a shoe. It is almost the perfect shoe ever, except for one thing. It will not protect your feet from getting wet in the rain or snow. This shoe is much better in the gym or warm weather, but if that doesn't faze you, like it didn't faze me, than get this shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Myles G. Trottman

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality, super comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these shoes. Man are they comfortable. Probably the most comfortable shoes I’ve ever owned. This was the second pair I bought. BUT I keep having the same issues with them. After 3-4 months a hole always appears in the area where my big toes are. I saw another review just now talking about the same thing. I got them for $40 and I see they’ve gone up to almost $100. I didn’t mind buying a second pair because of the price, but for $100 I would never. Not for the poor quality.
customer_reviews.author: Gus

customer_reviews.title: My riding shoes
customer_reviews.text: Bad photo but yeah I love these, all I buy is Nike really, I really really wish they were like the Nike Roshe, I thought they were the same thing but the netting is not as breathable(still breathable though) and the insole is a part of the shoe also not as nice as the Roshe. But overall the shoe is nicer.
customer_reviews.author: Ray

customer_reviews.title: Very Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I needed some new walking shoes and something for the spring/summer season. These fit my feet perfectly. I love the material that stretches around the toes. I kept forgetting I had them on they're so comfortable. I feel like I'm wearing socks and I love a simple, classic look. I would definitely buy these again.
customer_reviews.author: nicemommy23

customer_reviews.title: LOVE the fit & color
customer_reviews.text: I bought these in smokey mauve, and they are my new favorite shoe. They are SO comfortable, and I am obsessed with the color. Ran around the airport while traveling in these, and they were as comfortable as can be. Now I want them in every color! I usually wear a 7, but Nike usually runs big for me, so 6.5 was perfect.
customer_reviews.author: JDM

customer_reviews.title: Told I was buying men’s and received women’s
customer_reviews.text: The shoes I purchased were marketed and bought under the label and description that they were men’s shoes. I got them and jammed them on my feet and they’ve crushed my feet. At first I thought I just needed to break them in but realized they are not men’s as I had been promised as those I purchased. I have 3 pair of these in men’s and they are as comfortable as anything so I knew something wasn’t right. I would like my money back please and/or possible, they be replaced with a size 10.5 men’s version of these sneakers. Very upsetting.
customer_reviews.author: MMA

customer_reviews.title: Good shoe.
customer_reviews.text: My son loves these shoes. He’s a young boy so he is constantly growing. And he likes to run and play basketball. He wears out a pair of shoes pretty fast. He has had 3 pairs of this exact shoe for the last two years. We did change shoes once for another pair of Nikes but he ended up with heel pain and some mild plantar fasciitis. We stopped wearing those shoes and went back to these. He now has no foot pain. This seems to be a great shoe that supports the heels and arches.
customer_reviews.author: Ricki

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable but runs a half size small
customer_reviews.text: Great looking sneaker and comfortable but I had to exchange for a half size larger because it runs a little tight and narrow. Once I got the larger size, it fits perfectly and feels pretty sturdy for running, gym and everyday walking
customer_reviews.author: Richard I.

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, but terrible traction.
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are incredibly comfortable to wear, but after simple everyday use, the traction on the bottom got worn down very quickly. I've had them just over 6 months and the shoes now have zero traction (it's like I'm wearing socks –as far as traction goes) and I need to buy a new pair of shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Shafer

customer_reviews.title: Materials used is below standard.
customer_reviews.text: Tanjun are the worst sneaker so far in Nike history in my household . Bought them july 11th and they are in the trash already. Poorly made wore out the tread already plus the side of the shoe material got a stretched shredded spot in the material . Not the toe part in the ankle area. Money wasted.
customer_reviews.author: Lorrie

customer_reviews.title: Most comfortable shoe I've worn
customer_reviews.text: I've only ever worn basketball sneakers and skate shoes from Nike, Adidas, Converse and etc. These are the first part of sneakers I've owned that are incredibly comfortable. The first time I put them on I was really surprised. Now I make it a point to buy comfortable sneakers. They look really nice too. Has a clean and comfortable look to them. I wore them for 12 hour shifts in a warehouse and was comfortable the entire time I wore them.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler

customer_reviews.title: VeryComfortable Shoe
customer_reviews.text: I wear sneakers pretty much all day every day year round, and this type of shoe is very comfortable. I have owned and worn these shoes in the past(four pairs so far), and will probably continue to buy them in the future/
customer_reviews.author: jackrush

customer_reviews.title: Top of the line footwear!
customer_reviews.text: So, I had actually bought the same pair of shoes 4 years back. They lasted me 3 years and were perfect for everything, from working at my warehouse job, to hiking, and running. Can't wait for these pair to last me a while as well. These are very comfortable and durable shoes, highly recommend these to anyone looking for THAT shoe, this is THE ONE. Whether it be, casual wear, sport, work, this is your GO TO shoe. Looking forward to making more memories with these pair of shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Guccierrez

customer_reviews.title: I liked the comfort of these shoes so much that I ...
customer_reviews.text: Ok fair disclosure, I liked the comfort of these shoes so much that I purchase a second pair within 6 months of the first. They look great and feel like wearing bathroom slippers. The downside: in only 4 months the mesh broke open on the first pair. So, they get an average 3 stars, 5 stars for for comfort and looks, and 0 stars for durability.
customer_reviews.author: Tim from Austin

customer_reviews.title: Asymetric left and right sizes
customer_reviews.text: I don't know about this shoe generally, but the pair I received were different sizes. To be clear, each shoe's listed size was correct (as noted under the tongue). However, the right shoe was larger in length and width by several millimeters and resulted in an otherwise comfortable shoe feeling strange while walking. It caused my heal of my right foot to make premature contact with the ground which was very uncomfortable. The size issue aside, these shoes are very light. The soles lacked a hard rubber component which decreased weight but I suspect would lead to rapid wear.
customer_reviews.author: Suprized

customer_reviews.title: Love these Athletic Shoes
customer_reviews.text: I have a big foot (size 11 women's shoe). I purchased the black pair in a men's size 10, they are alittle bit wider in the toe area whereas a women's shoe fits tight and a wide is too wide. Very comfortable so I found these online and ordered them in white.
customer_reviews.author: Melinda Spears

customer_reviews.title: Good all around shoe
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes for daily use. Comfy. Goes with anything. Just wish the fabric cover over the insert was glued into place better. Mine started to slowly loosen up until it came out completely. Have had a few of these shoes and it happens after 2 months of wearing them. Not a big deal since they are so cheap, and inserts are cheap to buy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: My new favorite pair of shoes. Got these for 55 on Friday and they were at my door on Sunday. I'm pretty sure these are the casual/walking shoes I'll be wearing from now on. I'll save my Air Force Ones for those special occasions. They also give you a good amount of lift. Super clean black, I'm just hoping I don't get the white part dirty too quickly
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Cervantes

customer_reviews.title: My son is happy
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my son, who runs track for his local high school. He reports that they fit just great and he could not be happier. They seem to be well built and not too expensive, so I would say they are a good value for the money.
customer_reviews.author: John Temple

customer_reviews.title: Very nice shoes
customer_reviews.text: I love Nike athletic shoes. I really like this particular style. It is light-weight & very comfortable. It provides support but doesn't feel too restrictive. The body of the shoe breathes so my feet stay cool. Great shoe!
customer_reviews.author: Kathy L. Axsom

customer_reviews.title: Awesome, but buy a bigger size then you need.
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are always a size and a half to small. I bought 9.5 size last year (all my shoes are 9.5) and they were WAY to small. I ended up giving them to my son. These are size 11 and they fit snug. Not sure why they do this with the sizing.
customer_reviews.author: W. Daniel Keiling

customer_reviews.title: Very Comfortable but Too Snug in the Toes
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable and I only just got them so I can't comment on the durability, but even though I ordered a half size larger than the sizing chart indicated, the fit is very snug in the toes, three of which are visibly protruding against the tip of the toe box. If not for the give in the fabric, I would return them. I'll keep them and just order a full size larger next time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Got this for a birthday present.
customer_reviews.text: I got these shoes for a birthday present. The birthday has not yet occurred, so I cannot answer if the recipient was pleased, etc. Sorry I'm not more help. They look nice in the box....
customer_reviews.author: D. Weber

customer_reviews.title: Very Comfortable, very cheap...
customer_reviews.text: These shoes were great and very comfortable, however they only lasted 5 months before a hole appeared in the top of the shoe. Additionally, the netting at the front of the shoe began to come loose from the rubber sole at the tip of the shoe. Pretty disappointing, as these shoes are very lightweight and comfortable. For reference, I wore them to the gym (2-3x a week) and whenever doing any time of physical activity outside.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Meyers

customer_reviews.title: GREAT PRODUCT!
customer_reviews.text: Got just as expected and are great feeling on my feet. They have all day comfort being as I am a student and I walk 3 miles a day to get to and from school
customer_reviews.author: David Aguilar

customer_reviews.title: Solid pair of running shoes
customer_reviews.text: I wear them for running and they feel very comfortable. For the price they are very worth it. It is very bare bones so know that going in. If you want all the bells and whistles that seem to come with shoes these days, you're going to have to pay for it. This is a pair of shoes that will support, stay on your feet, and feel comfortable. Thats it.
customer_reviews.author: resipbcup

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Shoes
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are so amazing! I bought this pair for my boyfriend to wear when he works out. Love the way he looks wearing them when he wears them with out socks. GIGGITY!
customer_reviews.author: Kipper Snacks

customer_reviews.title: Run a size small
customer_reviews.text: I bought these same shoes but in a different color at Fred Meyer 6 months ago in a size 12 and were awesome. Bought them online in a different color but same size and they are too small. Not sure why that is. Order size bigger if this is the case
customer_reviews.author: Lori Olson

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.text: Great shores, just what I wanted. I'm in my mid 80's and I walk around 25 miles per week. My old Nikes had many miles on them, it was time to get new ones. I was looking for a light weight shoe and this one is just is just perfect. I put the shoes on and went for a 2 mile walk, they were just great, not sore feet issues at all.
customer_reviews.author: frogman

customer_reviews.title: Excellent and attractive shoe
customer_reviews.text: Excellent and attractive shoe. Although billed as a running shoe I wearthemwhen I know that I am going to be on my feet all day. The light weight and cushioned soles combine for excellent comfort. Although I usually use orthotics this shoe does not have removable insoles. No need! Still more comfortable than anything else, with no fatigue or strain on my plantar. These shoes are reasonably priced and look good. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: LA Fundraiser

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe for walking
customer_reviews.text: I bought this shoe because I needed a walking sneaker. I did some Google searches and this sneaker was highly recommended. Its a very lightweight shoe with great cushioning.
customer_reviews.author: Lance A. Haynes

customer_reviews.title: Very Unhappy
customer_reviews.text: My order arrived in a plain white box-not even a Nike box. There was no packing in it, and the laces were untied. This is a gift and I am totally disgusted with the way it arrived. IG it had been returned, ok, but I do expect a nicely packaged item. WTH????
customer_reviews.author: GA

customer_reviews.title: Looks great, size inconsistent
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic looking shoe, very happy with it for the price. I typically wear 10.5, but this sneaker runs small so 11 would have been better. I purchased mainly for casual wear, though will use it occasionally for running/jogging. If only sizes meant the same thing across brands... I can dream, I guess. Just pay attention to seller info as it relates to color/price - the seller I originally purchased from did not have the color combo in an 11 so could not facilitate and exchange. An alternate seller had the color combo in 11, but for $20 than my purchase price. Good looking shoe, just make sure you get the sizing right.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Jones

customer_reviews.title: Weird secondary shoe color not in advertised pictures
customer_reviews.text: The shoes were described as gray and they pictures on Amazon were great on both sides of the shoe. But when I received this order, one side of each show was a weird shade of blue.
customer_reviews.author: Jraw71

customer_reviews.title: Best sneakers ever
customer_reviews.text: This sneakers literally traveled with me around the world, I have been using them every single day since July 2019 and still going. The materials are of a good quality and also light, very easy to dry if it gets wet. I am just waiting to get my second pair but as the things are going it will take a long time before.
customer_reviews.author: Uma

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable shoes
customer_reviews.text: Needed a new shoe just to wear to the gym and workout. I love the simple look of these and they are light and comfortable. I normally wear a size 13 (which is what I got) and there was a full inch from my toe. But always better that they be a little big than a little small. Overall...great shoe.
customer_reviews.author: SSEJS

customer_reviews.title: This is really good summer shoes
customer_reviews.text: This is really good summer shoes. That is must have. This not only look good! It actually feels perfect on the feet. I wish all colors are in stock. As of today ( 10/01/2019 ) most colors are out of stock.
customer_reviews.author: mr. Y. G.

customer_reviews.title: Worst Quality ever!
customer_reviews.text: I'm really disappointed with the quality that amazon is supporting. I got this pair of shoes in january 2018. The net of the shoes was torn in 2 months !!! I gave this product another chance in october 2018 by purchasing again since I thought that product must somehow be old and maybe I'd be at fault and hence the wear and tear. The second pair literally tore in January again!!! I'm extremely disappointed with either very cheap quality products unintentionally getting mixed with the good lot or an intentional manifestation of extremely poor quality products under high prices distributed by amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Bhautik Pipaliya

customer_reviews.title: Break Your Feet In! Literally!
customer_reviews.text: These sneakers have changed horrendously. They will destroy your feet. I tossed mine in the trash can before they could do any more damage.
customer_reviews.author: livelearnlove

customer_reviews.title: Inconceivably light, amazingly comfortable
customer_reviews.text: They are so light, it feels like wearing a pair of socks. Very comfortable; the look good enough to be able to wear with business casual clothing. I'd imagine that they can't last too long since they are so lightly constructed, but even if that is so, their price-point makes it worth it for the comfort and fit.
customer_reviews.author: E. Nash

customer_reviews.title: Design flaw or knockoff?
customer_reviews.text: These were comfortable. I used them as walking shoes. Unfortunately, toe holes started to appear after a few months. The mesh top is really thin and won’t withstand more than a year of normal use. I would expect shoes to last longer than a year.
customer_reviews.author: DSandJr

customer_reviews.title: True to size, cheaply made though
customer_reviews.text: It's true to size, but I don't know if my son is just hard on shoes or if it's just the shoe, but he goes through a pair of these about every 4-6 months. I think they should last longer than that.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey

customer_reviews.title: Third pair a bought
customer_reviews.text: Third pair I bought these sneakers are like wearing slippers almost! I ordered a 4th which comes tomorrow or Thursday in case they stop making them!
customer_reviews.author: Michael J Egan

customer_reviews.title: Fit true to size and very comfortable right out of the box.
customer_reviews.text: These fit true to size and were very comfortable right out of the box. This is a nice, light, breathable shoe. I have not had them long enough to attest to their durability, but, as for comfort and fit, they’re very nice.
customer_reviews.author: MJ Smith

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: Wear these shoes for 3-12hour shifts at work, where I am on my feet for most of the shift. They are very confortable and receive lots of compliments as they match my scrubs.
customer_reviews.author: coach tj

customer_reviews.title: Runs a
customer_reviews.text: Runs a bit small. Bought these as a gift for our son, but they were to small. My husband typically wears an11 1/2 but these, a size 12 , fit perfect.
customer_reviews.author: T.P.

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: I own 2 pairs of these sneakers and they have held up well . What I like about these Nike's is that there light weight and comfortable on my feet plus they look good to....only bad is that if you wear them in the rain your feet will get wet. But I still buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: mike

customer_reviews.title: Comfort
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable and more so than most Nike shoes that I have tried. Not sure they will last as long as it is too soon to know.
customer_reviews.author: Frank Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoe- box in horrendous condition.
customer_reviews.text: My son liked these. The box, however, was so beat up (it was literally held together by rubber bands) that it was impossible to wrap as a Christmas gift. I cannot believe anyone would let an item leave the warehouse in that condition.
customer_reviews.author: amiller

customer_reviews.title: On your feet a lot? Just click Buy.
customer_reviews.text: These are the most comfortable shoes I've ever worn. I work on my feet all day and these keep me moving and in ZERO discomfort. I usually wear an 11.5 but this is a 12 for me. I'd do a half size bigger for the perfect fit.
customer_reviews.author: TB

customer_reviews.title: Nice but not made for colder weather
customer_reviews.text: My husband uses these for work and loves that they are black but also comfortable. It is hard to find all black comfortable shoes for men. These are really designed for warmer temperatures which is why I couldn’t rate it all five stars. We will see how they wear and I may update later.
customer_reviews.author: T

customer_reviews.title: Style with comfort
customer_reviews.text: May run a 1/2 size smaller than label. Very comfortable and lightweight. Has style for sneakers. Like um pretty dog gone good.
customer_reviews.author: Blood dog

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are awesome. This is my second pair. This time though, the toe room is a bit tight. The color is perfect and the design is comfortable. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Janet Brown

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Comfort
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love how light these shoes are. They wrap my feet in comfort and support. They look attractive as well. For sure will be getting this brand again soon
customer_reviews.author: connie

customer_reviews.title: So comfortable
customer_reviews.text: These are extremely comfortable sneakers to wear on a daily basis. Very lightweight (despite the relatively thick sole). And very breathable.
customer_reviews.author: Vince in LA

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good
customer_reviews.text: Product came very clean but had some decal defects. Some stitching was in the Nike logo. So you can clearly see the blue stitching inside the white nike logo. They fit well but are very snug. I usually buy 11.5 to have a little room but this 11.5 was exact fit. I will say that they are very comfortable and they breathe very well, keeping your feet cool.
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: lacking a little
customer_reviews.text: i like the look and feel of these shoes but find the arch support lacking and the size runs small. i ordered size 9.5 but would have ordered 10 if i knew
customer_reviews.author: Bill knotts

customer_reviews.title: Great choice. Light weight.  Cool for feet.
customer_reviews.text: Great fit. Comfortable from the first use. Keeping feel cool because of mesh uppers. As advertised. Zero complaints from me.
customer_reviews.author: D. Reider

customer_reviews.title: Careful with the material
customer_reviews.text: Not a great shoe. Ripped on the side after a month of use. Amazon was great in refunding me but I don’t think this is a great show
customer_reviews.author: Fran

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Got these for my dad as he wanted a plain white sneaker for the summer. These fit the bill, light, very comfortable, and look good on his foot. Hes satisfied so so am I.
customer_reviews.author: Jason.W

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Great pair of reasonably priced Nike shoes. I am very active and wear them a lot for workout and just when I am out running errands. They wear pretty fast on the bottom but for the price, great shoes.
customer_reviews.author: qdawn

customer_reviews.title: Comfy shoes
customer_reviews.text: Order these for my husband and they fit perfect . He wears a size 12 and has a narrow feet. With the breathable texture on the upper sole it very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie Pimentel

customer_reviews.title: amazon
customer_reviews.text: bought them 2 years ago liked they r still in good shape. re ordered just to have very comfterable and light .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They weren't good for running
customer_reviews.text: These shoes lack support. They weren't good for running, nor were they good for gym activities, like zumba.
customer_reviews.author: Bailey Marie

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable for my needs; I like the grey color
customer_reviews.text: I generally do not like Nike for the money and durability but I like this model and have even purchased a "backup" pair in case I am no longer able to find them in stores.
customer_reviews.author: DK

customer_reviews.title: Shoes
customer_reviews.text: Second pair of these shoes I've gotten for my husband. He really likes them.
customer_reviews.author: Kristy E. Bassett

customer_reviews.title: Just what I ordered
customer_reviews.text: He shoes arrived on time and they are the real thing no knock offs this is my second pair, I use these shoes a lot when working out and running they hold up real good.
customer_reviews.author: Tyron J.

customer_reviews.title: Comfy
customer_reviews.text: One of the most comfortable pair of sneakers I've ever worn. Only thing is due to the mesh or breathable nature of this shoe , it does not fare well in rain or bad weather. Great shoe to wear indoors or out on a dry sunny day.
customer_reviews.author: Emir

customer_reviews.title: What happened?
customer_reviews.text: The product was fine. I am just a bit embarrassed that this item was supposed to be a gift and the box came like this...
customer_reviews.author: Carla

customer_reviews.title: great shoe. totally satisfied.
customer_reviews.text: i purchased it for my son. He loves it and it fits comfortably. looks true to the photo as well. he says its his most comfortable shoe ever mainly because of the strong but breathable material used to make the upper part of the shoe..
customer_reviews.author: looking for quality

customer_reviews.title: Nike
customer_reviews.text: I have ordered these in the past and they are great for running. I reorder when I feel they are loosing support, about 4-6 months. I have 2 pair I rotate.
customer_reviews.author: Tucker

customer_reviews.title: Better than the FreeRun
customer_reviews.text: these are better than the FreeRun by a long margin... want all of the colors lol. combine with a Superfeet insole and you are in heaven.
customer_reviews.author: Brock Vond

customer_reviews.title: Sharp-Looking But Not A Perfect Fit
customer_reviews.text: A tad tight. Good-looking fabric & weight. Takes a few wearings to get comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Rick's Commentary

customer_reviews.title: Feel like ballarena shoes...
customer_reviews.text: While the color matched perfectly and the fit was correct, the shoe was too light. I don't think these will last. I stubbed my toe and it hurt like crazy!! The adidas i brought earlier were much stronger.
customer_reviews.author: D. Carr

customer_reviews.title: Runs small
customer_reviews.text: The shoes fit my husband well, after he reordered a 1/2 size up. The shoes run a little small. He normally wears a size 11. They had to be exchanged for an 11 1/2. It’s a well made shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy B.

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality or knock off
customer_reviews.text: I had these shoes for less than a month. I put 48 walking miles on them at which time there was not any tread on the sole. Either the shoes were defective, used because there was hardly any tread when I received them or a knock off. Never buy shoes online from this vendor or Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Barron

customer_reviews.title: Very nice, comfortable shoe for the price
customer_reviews.text: Really appreciated these after trying to replace with a cheap pair of a different brand.... These are very comfortable shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Channell

product_meta.title: Nike Men's Tanjun Premium Low-Top Sneakers
product_meta.description: Nike TANJUN PREM 876899-302 Men's Running Shoes
